description:
The versatile Ortovox zip system lets you bring the right bag for every occasion. It connects to the LiTRIC base unit using a perimeter zipper and can easily be swapped out depending on the objective at hand. It's rigged with ski touring features so you can carry a helmet and skis, board or snowshoes, with a separate front compartment for your avi gear.

  • Large main compartment is accessed via C-shaped perimeter zipper
  • Water resistant zippers keep snow out
  • Dedicated front compartment holds your avalanche gear
  • Top accessory pocket has a key clip
  • Adjustable sternum strap with safety whistle
  • Lots of external carrying capacity: dual ice axe loops, rope, helmet holder, diagonal ski carry straps and webbing to hold a snowboard or snowshoes
  • Ice axe and trekking pole loops
  • Hydration system compatible. (reservoir sold separately)
  • Compatible with AVABAG LiTRIC models. (sold separately)
name: Ortovox Litric Tour 36S Zip Avalanche Bag - Unisex
